html:
Thou shalt bring down the noise of strangers/song of the terrible ones. The Lord at his second coming will silence the strangers (foreigners, or those not of the covenant) and the terrible ones; their clamorous atmosphere and noise of battle will be brought low and no longer exist.

heat in a dry place…shadow of a cloud. The New International Version reads, "You [Lord] silence the uproar of foreigners; as heat is reduced by the shadow of a cloud."
